question.text: _____  who suffers from sleep problems could benefit from drinking this herbal tea.
An additional route was added to the rail line to reduce travel times in the southern  _____.

answer.explanation:
Based on the meaning of words
=> Choose D

question.text: During the holiday season, Schwartz Department store will  _____  special make-up gift sets.

answer.explanation:
Based on the meaning of words
=> Choose B

question.text: Buying a home for the first time can be complicated and even  _____  without help from a licensed real estate agent.

answer.explanation:
Based on the meaning of words
=> Choose B

question.text: The Brownsville Homeless Shelter has helped thousands of people since its  _____  last year.

answer.explanation:
The blank comes after a possessive adjective => need a noun
=> Choose D

question.text: The semi-finalists for the community art contest will be_____  by a panel of judges tomorrow.

answer.explanation:
Based on the meaning of words
=> Choose A

question.text: The penalties for canceling the cell phone contract early were  _____  stated in the agreement.

answer.explanation:
use an adverb to modify verb "stated"
=> Choose C

question.text: With the help of one of the IT technicians, the missing accounting files have been _____ .

answer.explanation:
We need to fill in a past participle to complete the passive form of the verb in the present perfect: have been + past participle.
=> Choose D

answer.explanation:
Based on the meaning of words
=> Choose C

question.text: A private reception for gallery donors will be _____ on March 5, prior to the grand opening of the exhibit.

answer.explanation:
